formattedAddress: 317 E 34th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 317 E 34th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I tried phoning my doctor's office today to see if there were any cancellations over the next several days so that I could visit earlier than Feb 13, 2024. I phoned her # from the website and got a recording requiring me to go through many options, and I STILL didn't reach her. Finally, I did reach a secretary in her office, one of 8. This woman explained that I can no longer call the doctor's office directly. She also explained that there is no way for any of the 8 secretaries to know of any cancellations. How is this possible? Someone calls and cancels. The appointment disappears from the doctor's calendar, for all to see. Easy breezy.  Why is this such a mystery? I have been with this medical group since the beginning, when it was Murray Hill Medical Group. Through all the reiterations it has gone through (now called Optum), nothing seems to improve!!!!!

originalText.text: This place has become really disappointing over the last few years given all the changes. I will not be going back again particularly after my most recent experiences - unprofessional and disorganized across staff and doctors

originalText.text: wow, 1) the automated system absolutely does not work and when you get in touch with the operator he absolutely sounds like he hates his job. Either fix the automated system or get atleast a semi friendly person to direct calls. Cant imagine how many customers youre losing in addition to me

originalText.text: Many changes happened to this entity, and it seems getting worse.  Doctors left and we were not notified.  No where to find my doctors.

text.text: Many changes happened to this entity, and it seems getting worse.  Doctors left and we were not notified.  No where to find my doctors.

originalText.text: Dr. Brown, Dr. Stern and Dr. Sonia are my doctors, my care team. I love them. They are courteous and they listen, I'm always comfortable with them and we always get the issue resolved. The staff at the front desk has gotten way better from the first time I went there to now. The nurses are always friendly. And the environment is always clean even the restroom. The doctors are the reason why I choose to stay at CareMount Medical!
